categories: Category:Star Wars: Episode IX The Rise of Skywalker actors

nodes.text: Elliot Hawkes is a British stunt performer who portrays a Spice Runner in the 2019 film Star Wars: Episode IX The Rise of Skywalker. He also served as a stunt performer for the film.

Hawkes has worked as a stunt performer in well-known Hollywood movies such as the James Bond movie Skyfall; Maleficent and its sequel; Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them and its 2018 sequel, and the Marvel movies Thor: The Dark World (starring fellow Star Wars actor Natalie Portman) and Guardians of the Galaxy.
